description: Numbers n not congruent to 0 (mod 3) such that phi(n) + 4 | sigma(n).
mathematica: Select[Range[100000], Divisible[DivisorSigma[1, #], EulerPhi[#] + 4] && !    Divisible[#, 3] &] - David Nacin, Feb 28 2012
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
extensions: Offset corrected and a(10)-a(23) from _Donovan Johnson_, Feb 28 2012
